direct_enhancements.reason: Both methods involve creating requests/responses related to refreshing with a lifetime attribute.
Both methods create responses with similar attribute handling and control flows.
Both methods handle error responses with similar exception handling mechanisms.
Both methods create error responses for refresh operations, making them substitutable in test cases.

The setup of a refresh request is required before creating a refresh response.
